name: folioblocks-out-of-scope-script
Description: Technically, I created this to reduce my time on looking up the commands.

scripts.reload-master-chain: pwsh -Command clear; npm run clear-node-files; cp backup/master/with_chain/** .; npm run backend-master
scripts.reload-archival-chain: pwsh -Command clear; npm run clear-node-files; cp backup/archival/with_chain/** .; npm run backend-archival
scripts.reload-master-registered: pwsh -Command clear; npm run clear-node-files; cp backup/master/registered/** .; npm run backend-master
scripts.reload-archival-registered: pwsh -Command clear; npm run clear-node-files; cp backup/archival/registered/** .; npm run backend-archival
scripts.reload-master-new: pwsh -Command npm run clear-node-files; npm run backend-master
scripts.reload-archival-new: pwsh -Command npm run clear-node-files; npm run backend-archival
